data.text: @merlinmee I found zinc really helpful when I was recovering x
@merlinmee I was shit for about 7 days and then cleared up fully about a week after that
@merlinmee I felt unwell for weeks. The worst for me was the pounding headaches
@HawbagHaws In all honesty I was irregular with it at first, but now I follow this plan which does help but it isn't really shifting the sinus pain :( https://t.co/p6IoivhbIC

@merlinmee This may be an absolute obvious but are you keeping on top of your pain meds? As soon as I was religious with my meds my temps dropped and I was clear within 2 days. Hope you feel better soon 🤟

Sorry for this moany tweet all, I'm just extremely fed up of feeling rotten and want to be back to doing productive things and enjoying the outdoors 😣😭 at least I have a nurse doing my obs regularly https://t.co/Sk7prD7AOL
